siteMetadata.title: Blog by Amirhossein Movahedi
siteMetadata.subtitle: I belong to no religion, my religion is LOVE and every heart is my Temple (Rumi)

frontmatter.title: Mail from Slack by OpenFaaS Cloud
frontmatter.description: In this tutorial I want to show you how I built a function to send emails from a Slack command. It runs for free on OpenFaaS Cloud using the Community Cluster.

frontmatter.title: OpenFaaS multi-stage with Istio on Kubernetes
frontmatter.description: In this post I want to show you how to Install OpenFaaS in multi-stage with Istio on Kubernetes and supporting cert-manager for SSL.
